alfredsnippet.snippet:
Get current work dir:

    os.getcwd()

Get script path:

    os.path.abspath(__file__)

Note: this won't work for interpreter. `__file__` will only be set for a file.

Others:

    os.path.dirname(path)
    os.path.realpath(path) # == abspath
alfredsnippet.name: os/sys: script path / work dir
